takeRealmSnapshot

public boolean takeRealmSnapshot()
Take a snapshot of this player's realm. The RealmSnapshot object builds and saves itself. This method need a lot a server resources ; it should not be called directly, by only by a cronjob.

Returns:
boolean false if the realm is empty (player has no building), true otherwise
